## Workshop Material

In this workshop we will cover:

- An overview of the breadth of different types of clinical data
- Best practices and tools for clinical data management and analysis
- General methods for measuring data, such as methods for analyzing clinical data over time

[Chris Battiston](https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopher-b-7246942/) will lead this workshop.
